errors.error_description: References non-existent scvelo.setup module and configure-cuda command that don't exist
correction_candidates: Remove the CUDA configuration command entirely as it's not needed
Replace with python -c "import torch; print(torch.cuda.is_available())" to check GPU
Change to python -m pip install --upgrade scvelo[cuda]
Update to python setup.py install --gpu for GPU configuration
errors.golden_answer: Remove the CUDA configuration command entirely as it's not needed
